amenities.title: Activities and Amenities | Grand Residence Riviera Cancun
amenities.metadescription: Grand Residences Riviera Cancun, offers you Premium Transportation, 24-hour room service, gym, spa, kids club, welcome gifts and much more. Reserve today!
amenities.descripcion: From a day of total relaxation at the spa to bike rides, at Grand Residences Riviera Cancun there are fun activities for everyone in the family and luxury amenities for special touches of pampering.

kids.titulo: Fun for the little ones at the Kids Club
kids.descripcion:
Children are always unstoppable bundles of energy, and our Kids Club team has a non-stop program of activities to keep them busy. They’ll have fun with treasure hunts, pirate’s face painting, craft classes, hockey, movies and video games, a Lego competition and more.

If you are traveling with toddlers, cribs, high chairs, bed rails and more are available. Request them upon arrival.

amenities.actividades titulo: See our line up of activities

actividades.descripcion: Enjoy a cooking class with the chef and learn how to prepare Mexican dishes, perfect pasta, divine desserts and much more.
Not sure how to prepare your favorite cocktails? Take our mixology class.
Indulge with Afternoon Tea on the terrace. The finest teas from China and India, tasty sandwiches, warm scones and heavenly cakes, it’s a delicious Grand Residences Riviera Cancun tradition.

Start the day with a relaxing and rejuvenating yoga class on the deck. Take a deep breath, find your balance and be at one with nature. Kick off your shoes and enjoy the calming presence of paradise washing over you.

From beach volleyball and water polo to pottery painting and movie nights, there’s always something fun to do and enjoy in paradise. And whenever you want to go exploring, the Concierges will help you arrange snorkeling, scuba, fishing charters, catamaran cruises and day trips for incredible vacation adventures.
Keep up with your daily exercise routine at the gym, it offers the latest fitness and weights equipment for you to use during your stay.

spa.titulo: Moments of bliss in a haven of healing and harmony
spa.descripcion: You deserve to be pampered on vacation and that includes blissful moments at the Spa. Our sanctuary of peace and calm will soothe body and soul with massages, facials and wraps to restore harmony and wellbeing. Discover a collection of the latest luxury treatments from leading spa skincare companies. Deliciously fragrant herbal and floral formulas nourish and soften your skin and for a special touch of luxury try the spa bath experience in your suite.

amenidades.titulo: Special amenities at Grand Residences Riviera Cancun
amenidades.descripcion: We strive for excellence, always going above and beyond to make your stay truly relaxing and unforgettable. Our pampering includes luxury amenities, touches of refinement and exclusive perks to create magical moments and make you feel special. Experience the wow factor everywhere you look, in every meal, in the courtesy of our staff as they look after you. We just want you to be happy.
